document_data.mainbody:
The Happy Horse Ranch was a family-owned business that operated in Triboar in the Dessarin Valley during the late 15 century DR. It was owned and operated by Janele Karnveller, who was aided by her three sons.
Together, the Karnveller family bred, reared, and housed horses that were later sold.
The ranch comprised two-story log-built house with an outhouse that served as the family home a stone storehouse used to hold saddles, bridles, bits, and reins a stone stables leading to a fenced riding yard and a fenced paddock that was used for grazing. It lay in the southwest of Triboar, south of Gwaerons Slumber.
